channel.title: How to change the welcoming statement when you log in?
channel.description:
When you login into runescape it says "Welcome to Runescape"
In various mopar server's it says different things like "Welcome" "forums:" or even "happy new years"
Where and how do i change the text in the chatbox when you first log in?

item.title: How to change the welcoming statement when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:7, topic:262997”][quote author=SRNscape link=topic=347415.msg2674628#msg2674628 date=1234999578]
ok thank you both i got it now!
[/quote]
Next time use the search bar before asking. ;)[/quote]yes thats right! I keep say use the search bar or google, before posting.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the welcoming statement when you log in?

item.title: How to change the welcoming statement when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

It’s just not showing the details.

compile.bat is compile. same thing.

You have to double click it. Make sure it is set to your current JDK version.

item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

well thank him for trying to help i suggest looking at my tut before doing anything so you get a bit better with the files u will be using
but to answer your question
open the text file titled “Client” press and hold Ctrl & F and then search for it

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the welcoming statement when you log in?

item.title: How to change the welcoming statement when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“SRNscape, post:1, topic:262997”]When you login into runescape it says “Welcome to Runescape”

In various mopar server’s it says different things like “Welcome” “forums:” or even “happy new years”

Where and how do i change the text in the chatbox when you first log in?[/quote]

the screen or the text box text?

text box text:

search what it says in client.java

login screen:

search for what it says and add what you want
OR
if you wanted to delete it search for:

newwelc

then delete what is making it appear.

you will then get errors so, search for newwelc and delete all 4 or 3.

Read full topic
